document.full_text: moroccan forces used truncheons to disperse a pro-democracy protest on the southern outskirts of the kingdom's capital rabat on sunday, wounding several people, a reuters reporter at the scene said.
document.title: moroccan forces disperse opposition protest
lines_and_colors: moroccan forces used truncheons to disperse a pro-democracy protest on the southern outskirts of the kingdom's capital rabat on sunday, wounding several people, a reuters reporter at the scene said.
